thread.title: NY approves grants for local fingerprinting equipment
thread.title_full: NY approves grants for local fingerprinting equipment - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: NY approves grants for local fingerprinting equipment
text: New fingerprinting equipment will be supplied to 51 police departments and sheriff’s offices across the state through $710,000 in state grants. Gov. Andrew Cuomo announced on Monday the purchase of electronic fingerprinting equipment for the recipients, Gannett’s Nick Muscavage reports. “Fingerprinting is a proven and highly effective crime-fighting method – which drives us to help [...] The post NY approves grants for local fingerprinting equipment appeared first on Politics on the...
